ideas.title: Protected pretrained directory (v8)
ideas.description: Fixed pretrained loading to use models/pretrained/ instead of models/state/
ideas.hypothesis: Previous tests failed because experiments corrupted models/state/. Now using protected directory.

ideas.title: Protected pretrained + tighter stops (-5%/+15%)
ideas.description: Correct pretrained NN from protected directory with tighter stop loss
ideas.hypothesis: Quality-filtered trades with tighter stops improve per-trade P&L
